1297700.name: Cross of Auria - Gift Pack I
1297700.description:
The Cross of Auria Founder's Pack I is stuffed full of exclusive goodies for players to get a head start on their journey in Revan!

This pack includes:
• An accessory for Ruby which grants access to the skill "Seraph's Guidance."
• A fire-elemental sword which grants access to the skill "Flamestrike."
• A water-elemental sword which grants access to the skill "Aquastrike."
• Four pieces of gear from the 30 point poison-resistant 'Ignis Set' - Head, Gloves, Boots, & Ring.
• 5000 Gold.
• 25 Mystery Coins.
• 30 Poison, Fire, & Frost Essences.
• 5 Phoenix Wings
• 5 of each tier 1 elemental flask (Fire, Frost, Water, Poison, Earth, Wind, Electric).
• 3 of each tier 1 elemental tome (Fire, Frost, Water, Poison, Earth, Wind, Electric).
• 10 Great Potions, Great Magick Potions, & Strong Elixirs.

Pack contents may be redeemed once per save file in the Veil, accessible from various points throughout the world.
